TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner
Public Class DataSourceDesigner Inherits ControlDesigner Implements IDataSourceDesigner
type DataSourceDesigner = class inherit ControlDesigner interface IDataSourceDesigner

summary.span: 在设计宿主中为 类提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a design host for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是基类的数据源设计器，如， ，和类。The class is the base class for data source designers, such as the , , and classes. 如果创建新的数据源控件，您可能还要创建自定义控件设计器为您的控件和获得从类。If you create a new data source control, you might also want to create a custom control designer for your control and derive it from the class. 类具有两个事件的方法：和方法。The class has two event methods: the and methods. 这两个这些事件可以暂时禁用与方法，用于设置属性。Both of these events can be temporarily disabled with the method, which sets the property. 可以使用重新启用事件方法方法。The event methods can be enabled again with the method. 有两个可用于计算架构或视图的等效性，而不创建类的实例的静态方法：There are two static methods that you can use to evaluate the equivalency of schemas or views without creating an instance of the class: - 方法比较两个架构。The method compares two schemas. - 方法比较两个视图的架构。The method compares the schemas of two views. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过几个其他较小自定义类，使用自定义数据源控件下表中列出。The following code example shows how to use a custom data source control with several other small custom classes, as listed in the following table. |自定义类Custom class|派生自Derived from| |------------------|------------------| |`CustomDataSource`|| |`CustomDataSourceDesigner`|| |`CustomDataSourceView`|| |`CustomDesignDataSourceView`|| |`BookListViewSchema`|| |`CustomIDFieldSchema`|| |`CustomTitleFieldSchema`|| |`BookItem` （两个字段的数据结构。）`BookItem` (A two-field data structure.)|| 后进行编译的代码示例，请在设计视图中打开.aspx 页面，并将`DataSourceID`属性设置为自定义数据源控件的 ID。After compiling the code example, open the .aspx page in Design view and then set the `DataSourceID` property to the ID of the custom data source control. [!code-csharp[DataSourceDesignerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/CS/DataSourceDesignerSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataSourceDesignerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/VB/DataSourceDesignerSample.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataSourceDesignerSample#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/CS/DataSourceDesignerSample.aspx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataSourceDesignerSample#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/VB/DataSourceDesignerSample.aspx#6)]

para.span: 若要在设计时在派生类中提供的操作列表菜单命令，必须重写属性以返回自定义具有派生自的自定义项对象对象。

span.span: To provide commands for the action list menu at design time in a derived class, you must override the property to return a custom object with custom items that are derived from the object.
Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计时由设计宿主调用构造函数。The constructor is called by the design host at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ActionLists As DesignerActionListCollection

summary.span: 获取项的列表，其中的项用来在设计时创建操作列表菜单。

span.span: Gets a list of items that are used to create an action list menu at design time.

value.span: 包含控件设计器的操作列表项的 对象。

span.span: A object containing the action list items for the control designer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用简单的复合控件控件和一个控件，以及要设置的属性`Text`这两个内部控件上的属性以及和的属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple composite control with a control and a control, along with properties to set the `Text` properties on both internal controls, as well as the and properties of the control. 关联的控件设计器类创建了三个命令时，每个用于在控件上设置两个属性和其设置可以回滚的撤消功能设计宿主中。An associated control designer class creates three commands, each of which sets two properties on the control, and whose settings can be rolled back with the undo functionality in the design host. 尽管代码示例不使用自定义对象，它说明了如何重写属性。Although the code example does not use a custom object, it illustrates how to override the property. [!code-csharp[DesignerInvokeTransactedChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerInvokeTransactedChange/CS/InvokeTransactedChangeSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerInvokeTransactedChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerInvokeTransactedChange/VB/InvokeTransactedChangeSample.vb#1)]

para.span: 当你创建的自定义类的派生自类，必须重写属性。

span.span: When you create a custom class that is derived from the class, you must override the property.

para.span: 在重写方法中，首先调用基类创建默认对象，以及如何将自定义特定于您的类的操作的列表。

span.span: In your override method, first call the base class to create the default object, and then add a custom list of actions that are specific to your class.
Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CanConfigure As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanConfigure { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以调用 方法。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the method can be called.

value.span: 如果可以调用 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if can be called; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用中启用或禁用特定的数据源的设计时配置的自定义类的属性。Use the property in a custom class to enable or disable design-time configuration for a specific data source. 如设计宿主[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]使用属性来确定是否配置数据源的命令所示的操作列表菜单在设计时。A design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] uses the property to determine whether a command to configure the data source appears in the action list menu at design time.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CanRefreshSchema As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanRefreshSchema { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以调用 方法。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the method can be called.

value.span: 如果可以调用 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the can be called; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用派生类来启用或禁用的功能设计时为特定的数据源刷新架构中的属性。Use the property in a derived class to enable or disable the ability to refresh the schema at design time for a specific data source. 如果你的应用程序需要的不变的数据结构，并且将永远不会更改架构，你想属性以返回`false`。If your application requires an invariant data structure and the schema will never change, you want the property to return `false`. 如设计宿主[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]使用属性来确定是否要刷新的架构的命令所示的操作列表菜单在设计时。A design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] uses the property to determine whether a command to refresh the schema appears in the action list menu at design time. 在设计宿主如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，可以看到中完成以下过程执行操作的属性：In a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you can see the property in action by completing the following process: 1. 在页面上放置或控件。On your page, place a or an control. 2. 在设计视图，请在操作列表中，单击**配置**。In Design view, on the action list, click **Configure**. 3. 从数据源中删除几个字段。Remove a few fields from the data source. 4. 在操作列表中，单击**刷新架构**。On the action list, click **Refresh Schema**.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Configure() cil managed

summary.span: 启动设计宿主中的数据源配置实用工具。

span.span: Launches the data source configuration utility in the design host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中不支持方法类; 但是，它可以被重写继承的自定义数据源设计器类。The method is not supported in the class; however, it can be overridden by custom data source designers inheriting from the class. 在设计宿主如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，可以看到中完成以下过程执行操作的方法：In a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you can see the method in action by completing the following process: 1. 将放或在页面上的控件。Put a or an control on your page. 2. 在设计视图中，在操作列表中，单击**配置**。In Design view, on the action list, clicking **Configure**.

exception.span: 已尝试在基类中调用此方法。

span.span: An attempt was made to invoke this method in the base class.

summary.span: 当数据源的属性已更改且 值为 时，引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when the properties of the data source have changed and the value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知绑定到关联的数据源来刷新其控件在设计宿主中的每个控件的控件设计器。The method notifies the control designers of each control that is bound to the associated data source to refresh its control in the design host. 方法可与抑制方法或通过调用方法的参数替换`false`。The method can be suppressed with the method or by calling the method with an argument of `false`.

span.span: An object.

summary.span: 当数据源的架构已更改且 值为 时，引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when the schema of the data source has changed and the value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知绑定到架构中的字段已更改的关联的数据源的每个控件的控件设计器。The method notifies the control designers of each control that is bound to the associated data source that the fields in the schema have changed. 方法可与抑制方法或通过调用带有参数的属性`false`。The method can be suppressed with the method or by calling the property with an argument of `false`.
